text: Plentywood is a city in Montana in the United States. It is the county seat of Sheridan County. About 1,700 people lived there in 2020. The first business in Plentywood opened in 1900, and a post office was established two years later. The city incorporated in 1912, following the arrival of a Great Northern Railway branch line. ==References== Category:Cities in Montana Category:County seats in Montana Category:1912 establishments in the United States
title: Plentywood, Montana
